content:
Frame Maker
Frameworks 2024
Mike Ghen
Ben Scheinberg
Problem
Frames are not easy to code,
and the people most likely to want to 
make frames are non-technical
Solution
A no-code solution application to 
generate frames from templates 
Block Diagram
How it Works
Connect a web3 
wallet
Select a template 
and ﬁll out the 
form
Share your frame 
on a Farcaster 
client
Click launch 
button and pay to 
deploy contract 
and frame
Next Steps
More currencies
More Templates
Token Gating
Allow frame creators to 
offer discounts or 
whitelists for owning 
other digital assets
Integrate a relayer to 
pay in any compatible 
EVM currency
Give the user more 
control over design 
decisions
Mainnet 
Deployment
Go live on Base!
